humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 23 out of 23 lymph nodes are positive for metastatic carcinoma (23/23). Based on the new rule 13, N3 indicates metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 23 out of 23 lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma with extranodal extension, which corresponds to N3a stage. The N3 stage is assigned regardless of the number of positive nodes when there is extranodal extension.
